item.title: Making a completely free website
item.description: I embarked on trying to create a public website today, and, evidently, have suceeded. I currently cannot afford another domain, nor hosting for the website, so this is the story of how I made a, fully hosted functional, free website. Hosting My personal site is currently hosted on my VPS, but it is often a hassle to deal with. I am happy with that, for that site, as I feel it provides a good learning experience, but for this site I just wanted something that would work.
